officialTitle: Prospective Cohort Study for Development of Personalized Treatment Strategy Based on Biologic Tumor Behavior and Clinical Characteristics in Young Breast Cancer (YBC) Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Diagnosis with breast cancer
2. Age under 40 year-old or diagnosis with breast cancer at pregnancy or within 1year after delivery
3. Obtained informed consent form

Exclusion Criteria:

1) Cannot understand or disagree to informed consent form
